A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The movie is too long and not interesting in a lot of spots. The humor is awkward and badly timed. Its more like a parody of a Star Wars movie.Self aware humor in a Star Wars movie? No thanks. New force powers are invented just to get characters out of troubling situations. And last and most important Luke Skywalker is absolutely ruined in this movie. If you held him dear DO NOT GO SEE THIS MOVIE it ruins everything good about him.  Which in turns takes away everything he does in the orginal trilogy if this is his story arc. Its an absolute shame. Plus with everything that transpires in this movie theres no point in seeing the 3rd. You'd have to be pretty dense to not realize how this is going to end now. Myself personally I have no interest in Star Wars anymore after this movie.
